Animal mobility destination point risk

calc_animal_mobility_flows_risk.Rd

Calculate the emission risk associated with each animal mobility flow that enters the epidemiological units (EU). The quantity of each flow associated to a point inside study EUs is aggregated. The emission risk of a point is then weighted by the quantity of animals coming from the origin country.

Usage

calc_animal_mobility_flows_risk(animal_mobility, emission_risk, epi_units_iso3)

Arguments

animal_mobility

the animal mobility dataset

emission_risk

emission risk data set

epi_units_iso3

the iso3 code for the country in which the study EUs are situated.

Value

A dataframe of aggregated and weighted risk for each pointin the study EUs.

On this page

This R package was developed by Ardata for CIRAD to provide a tool for analysing geospatial epidemiological.
